overview: SearchRPM was founded by Michael Ramirez. After graduating from the University Texas School of Communication with a degree in Advertising, Michael joined an interactive advertising agency as an SEO specialist and later founded SearchRPM based in Austin, TX. Michael quickly realized that many standard SEO practices went against the traditional lessons of marketing and advertisingâ€“namely, giving the customers what they wanted, when and how they wanted. So he set about creating a new approach that provided tangible SEO results without sacrificing the customer.
